title: MindRank Announces First Patient Dosed in Phase III Trial of AI-Designed Oral GLP-1 Receptor Agonist MDR-001
description: SHANGHAI, China, Feb. 25, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- MindRank, a clinical-stage artificial intelligence (AI)-empowered drug discovery company, today announced that the first patient has been dosed in the Phase III clinical trial of MDR-001, its AI-designed oral small-molecule GLP-1 receptor agonist (GLP-1RA) for the treatment of obesity and type 2 diabetes in China.

title: 'Modi more than a friend', says Netanyahu as Israel honours Indian PM with 'Speaker of the Knesset Medal'
description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu presented Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi with the Speaker of the Knesset Medal, the Israeli.Narendra Modi Israel visit, Benjamin Netanyahu Narendra Modi friendship, India Israel relations, Speaker of the Knesset Medal Modi, Modi Israel honor, India Israel strategic ties, AI and defense cooperation India Israel, Israel India, artificial intelligence India Israel relations, Modi Netanyahu bromance, zero tolerance for terrorism India Israel, India Israel bilateral trade, foreign leader Knesset Medal, Modi Palestine honor, radical Islam India Israel
content:
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Wednesday described Prime Minister Narendra Modi as "more than a friend" as Israel honoured the Indian leader with the Speaker of the Knesset Medal, the highest honour of the Israeli Parliament.

title: TCS is asking staff to use AI even if it hits revenues: CEO K Krithivasan
description: Tata Consultancy Services is not resisting disruption from artificial intelligence, but is encouraging its associates to bring AI-led efficiencies even if it compresses the company’s revenue, chief executive K Krithivasan said.
content:

title: Nvidia gets US licence for small amount of H200 exports to China
description: The leading maker of artificial intelligence accelerators said that the US government granted it a licence for H200 shipments, subject to inspection in the US and a 25% duty
content:
Nvidia Corp. said it secured a license to ship a small number of its less advanced H200 chips to customers in China, inching forward in its bid to return to the world’s largest semiconductor market.

title: US orders diplomats to fight data sovereignty initiatives
description: President Donald Trump's administration ​has ordered US diplomats to lobby against attempts to regulate US tech companies' handling of foreigners' data, saying in an internal ​diplomatic cable seen by Reuters that such efforts could interfere with artificial intelligence-related services.
content:

title: Snowflake expects annual product revenue above estimates as AI boosts demand

title: White House to host Big Tech after pledge to rein in power costs
description: The White House said on Wednesday ​it will host leading data center and artificial intelligence companies next week, with attendees expected to include Microsoft, Amazon, Anthropic and Meta Platforms to formalize a deal to shield consumers from rising power costs.

title: Asia tech stocks rally as Nvidia earnings soothe AI slowdown fears
description: Asian tech stocks rallied as stronger-than-expected results from Nvidia eased concerns that momentum in artificial intelligence spending was cooling.
content:
Asian tech stocks rallied in early trading on Thursday as stronger-than-expected results from Nvidia eased concerns that momentum in artificial intelligence sector was cooling.
